text: is a 2017 Japanese romance drama film directed by Naomi Kawase. It was selected to compete for the Palme d'Or in the main competition section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. At Cannes it won the Prize of the Ecumenical Jury. ==Cast== * Masatoshi Nagase as Masaya Nakamori * Ayame Misaki as Misako Ozaki * Noémie Nakai * Chihiro Ohtsuka * Kazuko Shirakawa * Tatsuya Fuji as Kitabayashi ==Reception== The film received a 57% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes, based on 21 reviews with an average rating of 6/10. It also holds a weighted average rating of 52 out of 100 on Metacritic, based on 5 critics, indicating "mixed or average reviews". ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:2017 romantic drama films Category:Japanese films Category:Japanese-language films Category:Films directed by Naomi Kawase Category:Films about blind people Category:Films about photographers Category:Japanese romantic drama films
title: Radiance (2017 film)
